analysisReport.title: Boosting Embodied AI Agents through Perception-Generation Disaggregation and Asynchronous Pipeline Execution

keyFindings.finding: Traditional sequential computation patterns in embodied AI systems face limitations in achieving high throughput.
keyFindings.potentialApplication: Large language models for robotic manipulation and control

keyFindings.finding: Auras improves throughput by 2.54× on average while achieving 102.7% of the original accuracy.

techniques.potentialApplication: Efficient inference of large language models
Advancements in embodied cognition, where AI systems can reason about physical environments

potentialApplications.application: Robotics: Improved robotic manipulation capabilities through the use of LLMs.
Computer Vision: Enhanced image recognition and segmentation tasks using diffusion transformers.
relatedTechniques: Pipelined data-parallel CPU/GPU scheduling for multi-DNN real-time inference

paper_title: Boosting Embodied AI Agents through Perception-Generation Disaggregation and Asynchronous Pipeline Execution
